text:
Hiori-chan, maybe it's about fabric softener...
it says "Nemophila scent" there───

Oh, I see.
......It's kind of unusual, usually it's floral or something.

......Hey, Hiori.
I have a little... consultation...

About whether it can be used for tonight's stay, right? There are
trial sizes, and if there's any leftover, we can use it back home.

Hehe...
We can all have the same scent together, huh...?
